thread.title: Achieving the right balance

author: The Telegraph
title: Achieving the right balance
text: Read more at Business Reporter Merchants can be reluctant to adopt fraud services because they are perceived as constraining business growth, but it is possible to increase profitability and enhance brand value by implementing a trusted and effective solution. Payment and fraud services should be designed hand-in-glove to enhance a merchant’s brand, not detract from it, and if implemented correctly can actually increase online revenues. More effective online payment processes and fraud checks actually increase profitability Merchants today recognise the importance of an effective online presence, and are prepared to invest time and money creating a website that reflects their values. It therefore follows that these values should flow through the entire customer journey, including the payment process and fraud checks. Trustpay Global’s intuitive online and mobile solution, pinPay™ , has managed to achieve the right balance. Patented two-factor step-up authentication for higher-value or suspect transactions is combined with a unique and intuitive express checkout payments experience, providing the maximum protection to merchants and consumers in more than 22 countries. pinPay™ works seamlessly with a merchant’s website and ensures that consumers’ payment and personal data are encrypted and stored in highly secure data vaults without being detrimental to the end-to-end payments process. Combating fraud and increasing revenues are not mutually exclusive. With the right partner it is possible to reduce fraud and increase revenues and profitability. • For more information visit www.trustpayglobal.com or email info@trustpayglobal.com • This article was originally produced and published by Business Reporter.
